examples.korean: one of the central dogmas of the Church 발음듣기 교회의 중심 신조[교리] 중 하나 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Floral tributes were sent to the church. 발음듣기 그 교회로 조화(弔花)들이 보내져 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She now lies at rest in the churchyard. 발음듣기 그 분은 이제 영면에 들어 교회 묘지에 누워 계신다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She now lies at rest in the churchyard. 발음

examples.korean: The church became a sanctuary for the refugees. 발음듣기 그 교회는 난민들의 피난처가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The church became a sanctuary for the refugees. 발음
